survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Home Cleaning Robots Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have used AI-powered home cleaning robots to assess their satisfaction, identify pain points, and explore areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your AI-powered home cleaning robot?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for ease of analysis. Ensure the scale is balanced and clearly labeled.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your AI-powered home cleaning robot?

questions.question_text: Which features of your AI-powered home cleaning robot do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow for multiple selections to capture diverse feature preferences. Include an 'Other' option for unexpected responses.

script.question_text: Which features of your AI-powered home cleaning robot do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using your AI-powered home cleaning robot?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for comprehensive responses.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using your AI-powered home cleaning robot?

questions.question_text: How often do you use your AI-powered home cleaning robot?
questions.client_notes: Frequency of use can indicate product reliability and user dependency. Use clear, distinct time frames.

script.question_text: How often do you use your AI-powered home cleaning robot?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your AI-powered home cleaning robot to others?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) can be derived from this question. Ensure the options cover the full range of likelihood.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your AI-powered home cleaning robot to others?
